title: Update Strings.it.xlf removing spurious character
body:
Removed a spurious Ł character from the italian MSBuildVersionMessage message. The message is shown by VS Code every time a compilation is done, so it is quite annoying.

![image](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/assets/821344/ed409f17-2726-470c-96fd-5ac85ff453ff)

Fixes: one spurious character in a translation of the MSBuild Messages

Changes Made: removed the spurious character, compared the message to the english version of the same message

Notes: My first language is italian.

commit.message:
Update Strings.it.xlf removing spurious character

Removed a spurious Ł character from the MSBuildVersionMessage message. The message is shown by VS Code every time a compilation is done, so it is quite annoying.

nodes.body:
Thank you for the PR! The change looks good and makes sense to me.

Unfortunately we'll have to leave it open for a bit as the "canonical" home for the translated strings is in a tool outside this repo, so we have to report a localization bug to the loc team, so that the next loc update doesn't just revert it.
The internal ticket for Localization fix was created.
Close this PR, since it is addressed in scope of https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9296#pullrequestreview-1654513732
